name: NSTextDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods implemented by the delegate of an NSText object to edit text and change text formats.

items.name: func textDidChange(Notification)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the text object has changed its characters or formatting attributes.

items.name: func textShouldBeginEditing(NSText) -> Bool
items.desc: Invoked when a text object begins to change its text, this method requests permission for aTextObject to begin editing.

items.name: func textDidBeginEditing(Notification)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the text object has begun editing (that the user has begun changing it).

items.name: func textShouldEndEditing(NSText) -> Bool
items.desc: Invoked from a text objectâ€™s implementation of resignFirstResponder(), this method requests permission for aTextObject to end editing.

items.name: func textDidEndEditing(Notification)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the text object has finished editing (that it has resigned first responder status).
